Package soc.communication

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SOCMessageDispatcher
    Dispatcher for all incoming messages from clients.
    SOCServerSocket
    SOCServerSocket allows server applications to communicate with client Connections, with a common API for local Practice Mode and actual networked traffic.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection
    Connection is the client's connection at the server, with a common API for local (MemConnection) and actual networked traffic (NetConnection).
    MemConnection
    Symmetric buffered connection sending strings between two local peers.
    MemServerSocket
    Clients who want to connect, call connectTo and are queued.
    NetConnection
    A TCP client's connection at a server.
    SOCClientData
    The server's place to track client-specific information across games for a Connection session: Win-loss count, features, localization status, etc.
